info.brief_description: You could get crushed or end up in some girl or womanâs belly.
info.description:
You are Jason Fall; you are twenty-one years old and still live at home with your family. You have a hot girlfriend and have job at the electronics store in the mall. One day, with out warning you shrink to three inches small. You have read and fantasized about such and occurrence. Now that it has happened, you are not sure what to do, you need to get help, but you are hesitant because in all those stories that you read, the shrunken person usually ended up being crushed, sat on, or eaten, by a girl or a woman. You must set out on your quest for help. Either you will succeed in getting help or (more likely) die tying.
         It is summer, and your parents are away on vacation for three weeks, so they wonât be encountered in this story. The only family members you will encounter are your younger and older sisters or your cousin if she comes over to hang out with your sisters.

Main Characters:

         Erica: Your older sister. 23 years old. Brunette. She has always had a dislike for you, and tries to ruin your life whenever she has the opportunity. Get help from her at your own risk.
         Lauren: Your younger sister, 17 years old. Redhead. She has always been nice to you, but you think she likes you a little too much. You might be able to get help from her, but she might decide to keep you the way you are.
         Kristy: Your cousin. 19 years old. Brunette. Slightly overweight, but still cute and sexy. She tends to eat too much, and loves to try new foods. It would be risky to get help from her; she might decide that she wants to see what you taste like.
         Amanda: Your girlfriend. 22 years old. Brunette. Has a hot sexy body, has C-cup breasts and a lovely ass the jiggles slightly when she walks. You know she will help you, but if you can get to her safely you will ask her if you can play out your fantasies before she seeks help for you. She lives in an apartment with a roommate.
         Cindy: Amandaâs roommate. 24 years old. Blonde. Is just as hot as Amanda, but you donât like her because she keeps on trying to convince Amanda to dump you, saying that she is to good for you, that she could do better. Avoid her if you can, she wonât help, she will just think up some way to get rid of you and she will do it.
         Katie: The manager of the electronics store where you work. 26 years old. Brunette. She is actually hotter than your girlfriend. She has D-cup breasts and a nice round ass. You would love to get in her pants. She has a bit of a dominating personality, and loves the power that she has as manager, to boss you around. You are not sure if she would help you, or keep you as a slave that she has total control of.

Rules:
1.) No guys other than Jason, so no gay stuff.
2.) Unless he is changed back to normal, Jason is always to be 3 inches small.
3.) You can add other girls or women, but they have to be within the 17-30 age range.
4.) If you want to end the story, I would prefer that Jason be sat on or eaten. But if you want it doesnât half to be that way.
5.) Editions must be at least a paragraph long. (i.e.: 7 or more good sentences.)
6.) The story is always to be written in the second person perspective; meaning, âyou did this, or your girlfriend did that.â
7.) Spell and grammatical check your work; I hate having to correct poor writing. Write like you would have to for a college paper. Not like on msn-messenger.
8.) No animals, insects, bugs, etc., etc.

If you follow the rules perfectly, I wonât delete much. Also to "Danster", I deleted most of yours because they were too short, also, in a lot of the editions, you had the main character get sucked up girls ass, and got digested with out being in the stomach, which can't happen, so I deleted because it made no sense. So, no ass digestion.
